incidents.description: Mother and son (with family) showed up to marine base for holidays. At the base they stopped them and took them to Wilmington to investigate. They think under ICE Custody

location.city: Camp Lejeune and Marine Corps Air Station/ 812 Holcomb Blvd

incidents.description: Mother and son went on base to celebrate holiday with family, was detained entering and then sent to New Hanover jailed under ICE custody.
